name: Autumn Cafe Game
description:
Autumn is here, and your customers know it! 

Take the orders, prepare and deliver them as fast as you can before the day ends.

CONTROLS

WASD: Move

E, F: Interaction

ESC: Pause/Unpause

Recipies:

Mixer:

Apple pie- two apple slices, butter, egg

Pumpkin Pie- one pumpkin slice, butter, egg

Cake- Chocolate Bar, Butter, Egg

Hot Drink Station:

Coffee- 100% coffee

Tea- 100% tea

Coffee with sugar- 80% coffee 20% sugar

Tea with sugar- 80% tea 20% sugar

Latte- 60% coffee 40% cream

pumpkin spice latte - 60% coffee 30% cream 10% pumpkin spice
